All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ActivityMainBinding
 
AddCardsBottomSheet
Bottom sheet dialog fragment allowing the user to add multiple flashcards to a specific deck using a scrollable list of editable rows.
AddDeckFragment
Fragment that allows the user to create a new flashcard deck.
AppDatabase
Room database singleton used throughout the app.
AppDatabase_Impl
 
BrowseCardAdapter
Adapter used in browse mode to display flashcards in a RecyclerView.
BrowseCardAdapter.OnCardFlipListener
Interface to notify when a card is flipped (only to back side).
BrowseCardsFragment
Fragment that allows the user to swipe through flashcards one at a time in browse mode.
BrowseSetAdapter
Adapter used in browse mode to display available decks.
BrowseSetAdapter.OnDeckClickListener
Callback interface for deck click events.
BrowseSetListFragment
Fragment displaying a list of all available flashcard decks in browse mode.
BrowseSummaryFragment
Fragment shown at the end of a browsing session.
Card
Room entity representing a single flashcard.
CardAdapter
RecyclerView adapter that displays flashcards.
CardAdapter.OnCardClickListener
Callback for click events on cards.
CardDao
Data access object (DAO) for performing operations on Card entities.
CardDao_Impl
 
CardInputAdapter
RecyclerView adapter that displays a list of editable flashcard rows.
CardInputAdapter.CardInputVH
ViewHolder containing input fields for a single card.
CardRepository
Repository providing asynchronous access to Card data.
CardViewModel
ViewModel exposing card-related operations to the UI layer.
ClassicFragment
Fragment implementing the classic learning mode, where users flip flashcards and mark whether they know the answer or not.
ClassicResult
Entity storing the result of a completed classic flashcard session.
ClassicResultDao
DAO interface for accessing and storing results of classic learning sessions.
ClassicResultDao_Impl
 
ClassicSetListFragment
Fragment displaying a list of available flashcard decks for classic learning mode.
ClassicSummaryFragment
Fragment displaying a summary of the classic learning session.
ClassicViewModel
ViewModel managing state and logic for the classic learning mode.
Deck
Room entity representing a set of flashcards grouped under a named deck.
DeckAdapter
Adapter showing user-created decks in management screens.
DeckAdapter.OnDeckClickListener
Callback interface for deck click and long-click events.
DeckDao
DAO (Data Access Object) for performing operations on Deck entities.
DeckDao_Impl
 
DeckDetailFragment
Fragment displaying all flashcards from a specific deck.
DeckViewModel
ViewModel managing operations on flashcard decks.
DialogAddCardsBinding
 
EditCardFragment
Fragment for editing an existing flashcard.
FragmentAddDeckBinding
 
FragmentBrowseCardsBinding
 
FragmentBrowseSetListBinding
 
FragmentBrowseSummaryBinding
 
FragmentCardsManagmentBinding
 
FragmentClassicSetListBinding
 
FragmentDeckDetailBinding
 
FragmentEditCardBinding
 
FragmentHomeBinding
 
FragmentLearningBinding
 
FragmentLearningSummaryBinding
 
FragmentQuizBinding
 
FragmentQuizSetListBinding
 
FragmentQuizSummaryBinding
 
FragmentSummaryBinding
 
HomeFragment
Fragment representing the home screen.
ItemCardBinding
 
ItemCardInputBinding
 
ItemDeckBinding
 
ItemFlashcardBinding
 
MainActivity
Main activity hosting the navigation container for the application.
ManagmentFragment
Fragment listing all flashcard decks.
QuizFragment
Fragment implementing multiple-choice quiz mode.
QuizResult
Entity storing the result of a completed quiz session.
QuizResultDao
DAO interface for accessing and managing QuizResult entities.
QuizResultDao_Impl
 
QuizSetAdapter
RecyclerView adapter displaying decks when selecting a quiz or learning set.
QuizSetAdapter.OnItemClickListener
Listener interface for deck selection events.
QuizSetAdapter.ViewHolder
ViewHolder for a single deck entry.
QuizSetListFragment
Fragment displaying all available decks for quiz mode.
QuizSummaryFragment
Fragment shown after finishing a quiz session.
SummaryFragment
Fragment presenting statistics about completed quizzes and classic sessions.
SummaryViewModel
ViewModel responsible for exposing quiz and classic learning statistics to the summary screen.
